excerpt: This delicious cashew cheese is perfect for vegans or those wanting a dairy-free alternative to cheese. It's creamy, tangy, and perfect for spreading or dipping.

ingredients.name: Raw cashews
ingredients.notes: Soaked overnight or at least for 6 hours

ingredients.name: Filtered water
ingredients.notes: Add more or less depending on desired consistency

instructions.name: Make Cashew Cheese
instructions: Drain and rinse the soaked cashews.
Put them in a high-speed blender or food processor.
Add lemon juice, nutritional yeast, sea salt, and garlic powder.
Blend well until smooth, scraping down the sides as needed.
Add filtered water gradually, until desired consistency is reached. Continue blending until evenly combined.

instructions.name: Serve
instructions: Transfer the cashew cheese to a bowl or a glass jar with a lid.
Cover and store in the refrigerator until ready to use or serve immediately.
Enjoy as a spread or dip, and use within 5-7 days.
